TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_adidi'ay, title = adidi'ay, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/adidi'ay} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam:小的) u adidi'ay ku kanamuhan aku a kazizeng. 我喜歡小車.
(kamo no holam:小的) o adidi'ay ko kanamohan ako a kazizeng. 我喜歡小車.
